result.eng: Now that the summer has started, we can go on holidays.
result.ga: Anois agus an samhradh tosaithe is féidir linn dul ar saoire
result.orig: Anois agus an samhradh tosaithe is féidir linn dul ar saoire
result.html: Anois agus an samhradh tosaithe is féidir linn dul ar saoireNow that the summer has started, we can go on holidays.
result.ponchtml: Anois agus an saṁraḋ tosaiṫe is féidir linn dul ar saoireNow that the summer has started, we can go on holidays.

result.eng: We'd rather go on holiday in the winter.
result.ga: B'fhearr linn dul ar saoire sa gheimhreadh
result.orig: B'fhearr linn dul ar saoire sa gheimhreadh
result.html: B'fhearr linn dul ar saoire sa gheimhreadhWe'd rather go on holiday in the winter.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr linn dul ar saoire sa ġeiṁreaḋWe'd rather go on holiday in the winter.

result.eng: We were on holidays in Hungary.
result.ga: Bhí muid ar saoire san Ungáir
result.orig: Bhí muid ar saoire san Ungáir
result.html: Bhí muid ar saoire san UngáirWe were on holidays in Hungary.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ar saoire san UngáirWe were on holidays in Hungary.

result.ga: Bhí mé ar mo laethanta saoire
result.orig: Bhí mé ar mo laethanta saoire
result.html: Bhí mé ar mo laethanta saoireI was on my holidays.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ar mo laeṫanta saoireI was on my holidays.

result.eng: I was on holiday in Connemara.
result.ga: Bhí mé ar saoire i gConamara
result.orig: Bhí mé ar saoire i gConamara
result.html: Bhí mé ar saoire i gConamaraI was on holiday in Connemara.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ar saoire i gConamaraI was on holiday in Connemara.

result.eng: Where are you going on holiday this year?
result.ga: Cá bhfuil tú ag dul ar saoire i mbliana
result.orig: Cá bhfuil tú ag dul ar saoire i mbliana
result.html: Cá bhfuil tú ag dul ar saoire i mblianaWhere are you going on holiday this year?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil tú ag dul ar saoire i mblianaWhere are you going on holiday this year?

result.eng: Where will you go on holiday?
result.ga: Cén áit a rachaidh tú ar saoire
result.orig: Cén áit a rachaidh tú ar saoire
result.html: Cén áit a rachaidh tú ar saoireWhere will you go on holiday?
result.ponchtml: Cén áit a raċaiḋ tú ar saoireWhere will you go on holiday?

result.html: Fuair mé lá saoireI got a day off.
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé lá saoireI got a day off.

result.html: Tá a thuismitheoirí ar saoireHis parents are on holiday.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ṫuismiṫeoirí ar saoireHis parents are on holiday.

result.eng: We are going on holiday to Hungary.
result.ga: Tá muid ag dul ar saoire go dtí an Ungáir
result.orig: Tá muid ag dul ar saoire go dtí an Ungáir
result.html: Tá muid ag dul ar saoire go dtí an UngáirWe are going on holiday to Hungary.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ag dul ar saoire go dtí an UngáirWe are going on holiday to Hungary.

result.eng: We are on vacation and we will be in An Spidéal for only three weeks.
result.ga: Tá muid ar saoire agus ní bheidh muid ach trí seachtaine sa Spidéal
result.orig: Tá muid ar saoire agus ní bheidh muid ach trí seachtaine sa Spidéal
result.html: Tá muid ar saoire agus ní bheidh muid ach trí seachtaine sa SpidéalWe are on vacation and we will be in An Spidéal for only three weeks.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ar saoire agus ní ḃeiḋ muid aċ trí seaċtaine sa SpidéalWe are on vacation and we will be in An Spidéal for only three weeks.

result.eng: This is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.
result.ga: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shin
result.orig: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shin
result.html: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shinThis is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.
result.ponchtml: Is é seo an ċéad uair go ḃfuil mise agus mo ċlann ar saoire le ċéile ó ẛinThis is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.

result.eng: I hope that you enjoy your vacation here.
result.ga: Tá súil agam go mbainfidh sibh taitneamh as bhur saoire anseo
result.orig: Tá súil agam go mbainfidh sibh taitneamh as bhur saoire anseo
result.html: Tá súil agam go mbainfidh sibh taitneamh as bhur saoire anseoI hope that you enjoy your vacation here.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam go mbainfiḋ siḃ taitneaṁ as ḃur saoire anseoI hope that you enjoy your vacation here.

result.ponchtml: An raiḃ tú ar laeṫanta saoireWere you on holiday?

result.eng: Peadar, weren't you on holiday recently in Boston?

result.orig: A Pheadair nach raibh tú ar saoire le deireanaí i mBostún

result.eng: Where were you on holiday this year?

result.eng: I have not had a holiday for a few years.
result.ga: Ní raibh saoire ar bith agam le cúpla bliain
result.orig: Ní raibh saoire ar bith agam le cúpla bliain

result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ saoire ar biṫ agam le cúpla bliainI have not had a holiday for a few years.

result.eng: I went to County Kerry last year on my holiday.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé go Contae Chiarraí an bhliain seo caite ar mo laethanta saoire
result.orig: Chuaigh mé go Contae Chiarraí an bhliain seo caite ar mo laethanta saoire

result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé go Contae Ċiarraí an ḃliain seo caite ar mo laeṫanta saoireI went to County Kerry last year on my holiday.

result.eng: According to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.
